meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>mediator</kanji> who works with someone who doesn't have a <kanji>body</kanji> has to use some kind of mortal <vocabulary>media</vocabulary> to record what they're saying. Print media? Sure. Electronic media? Alright? Ghost media? No! Humans can't read that stuff!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
